group_1.textLeft: I've finished reading this one, how about you?

group_1.textRight: Y-yes! I’ve finished reading.

group_1.textLeft: ...You look pale, are you alright?

group_1.textRight: I’m...I’m fine!
(I can't say I'm actually bad with occult...)

group_1.textLeft: Okay, let’s get our information sorted out.
I didn't find any obituaries that could be@linked to the serial murder case...
But look at this article in the newspaper.

group_1.narration: A string of disappearances in Kamihama...@What is the connection between them?

group_1.textRight: Disappearances...!
Looks like the story I heard on the train is true.

group_1.textLeft: We've heard rumors of a series of murders around@Hozuki and rumors of the "Ripper Girl".
But we don’t know what the connection@between them is yet.
What have you found?

group_1.textRight: I heard that there's a lot of rumors in Kamihama.
Take a look at this magazine.

group_1.textLeft: Kamihama’s Bone-chilling...@Rumors...?

group_1.narration: The Ripper Girl’s Return!@The rumor of the Ripper Girl,@which had previously vanished,@is once again causing a stir@in the city of Kamihama!
This time, the Ripper Girl rips out your memories?!@There's no change to the fact that you’ll hear a bell@and be asked for your name, but it's not your body@she's ripping, it's your memories!
Since she at least spares your life,@maybe it's an improvement?!

group_1.textRight: This is the rumor of the Ripper Girl@going around Kamihama.
It seems to be like this now.

group_1.textLeft: Ripping memories...?
It’s much different from the rumor I heard@in Hozuki...

group_1.textRight: There were similar stories in several@occult magazines.

group_1.textLeft: ...Between the rumor I heard in Hozuki and@the one going around in Kamihama,
Let’s summarize the main points.

group_1.textRight: Okay!

group_1.narration: [textBlack:・Location: Deserted street at night.]@[textBlack:・The sound of a bell comes from nowhere.]@[textBlack:・A woman in a coat asks for your name.]@[textBlack:・If you tell her your name, she’ll kill you]@[textBlack:   by ripping you to pieces with a knife.]
[textBlack:・The origin of the rumor is Kamihama City.]@[textBlack:・It went viral a month ago.]@[textBlack:・Connected to the serial murder case?]

[textBlack:・Location: Back alley (time unknown)]@[textBlack:・The sound of a bell is heard from somewhere.]@[textBlack:・You will be asked your name.]@[textBlack:・If you answer, the knife will slash you,]@[textBlack:   but you will be unharmed.]
[textBlack:・Your memory will be ripped apart.]@[textBlack:・It has only spread recently.]@[textBlack:・Appearance unknown.]

group_1.textLeft: The only thing they both have in common is@the sound of a bell, and asking for your name...

group_1.textRight: ...Why did the rumor of “being ripped to pieces,”
turn into "your memory will be ripped out"?

group_1.textLeft: It's puzzling...
And why did the "woman in a coat" part@disappear...?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...

group_1.textLeft: We need more information.

group_1.textRight: I suppose...
Still, it's complicated when there’s two similar@rumors...
It’s hard to know which one you’re talking about...

group_1.textLeft: Then, how about something like this?

group_1.narration: "The Ripper Girl in Hozuki is a woman in a coat, so@she’s the ‘Coat Ripper Girl’."
"The Ripper Girl in Kamihama has@something to do with memories, so@she’s the ‘Memory Ripper Girl’."

group_1.textRight: That's easy to understand!
Those ladies are talking about the Ripper Girl!
Yeah, we're looking into urban legends.
Right now, it’s the Ripper Girl!
Tell us what you know!

group_1.textLeft: It’s okay to tell you, but...
Can you also tell us what you know, too?

group_1.textRight: Hmm, should we...
It’s the best of both worlds, right?

group_1.textLeft: I have a note here summarizing the Ripper Girl...

group_1.textRight: ...I don't know all these words.

group_1.textLeft: I’ll write the meanings for you.

group_1.textRight: Well...can’t be helped...

group_1.textLeft: So there's more than one form of the Ripper Girl.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
And there's one more thing I don't really get, but...
I heard "you shouldn’t answer, but you have to."

group_1.textLeft: ...What does that mean?

group_1.textRight: Um...@I don’t know...
The lady who told me about it didn't seem to@understand it either.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
Can you tell me what that person looked like?

group_1.textRight: Let me think...@She was wearing a uniform.
Ah!@It was a Sankyoin Academy uniform!
And she had...um...a ponytail and black ribbon!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
It's okay to look up urban legends, but@don't do anything dangerous, okay?

group_1.textRight: Ugh...@You sound just like mom...
We knooow...
I’ve made a new note with the information we@just heard.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Rumor of the Coat Ripper Girl: Hozuki]

[textBlack:・Location: Deserted street at night.]@[textBlack:・The sound of a bell comes from nowhere.]@[textBlack:・A woman in a coat asks for your name.]@[textBlack:・If you tell her your name, she’ll kill you]@[textBlack:   by ripping you to pieces with a knife.]
[textBlack:・The origin of the rumor is Kamihama City.]@[textBlack:・It went viral a month ago.]@[textBlack:・Connected to the serial murder case?]
[textBlack:Rumor of the Memory Ripper Girl: Kamihama]
[textBlack:・Location: Back alley (time unknown)]@[textBlack:・The sound of a bell is heard from somewhere.]@[textBlack:・Appearance: More than one form.]@[textBlack:・It has only spread recently.]

[textBlack:・Regarding names]@[textBlack:   You will be asked your name.]@[textBlack:   If you answer, the knife will slash you,]@[textBlack:   but you will be unharmed.]@[textBlack:   Your memory will be ripped apart.]@[textBlack:   You shouldn’t answer, but you have to.]

group_1.textLeft: Why don’t we head to that Sankyoin place next?

group_1.textRight: The person who told those kids the story@goes to school there.
Sounds good to me!

group_1.textLeft: Magic power...?

group_1.textRight: ...It’s close.

group_1.textLeft: ...Chisato.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...!@Let’s go.
